com.brtbeacon.sdk

类 BRTBeacon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brtbeacon.sdk.BRTBeacon

  • public class BRTBeacon
extends java.lang.Object
     BRTBeacon类
 定义Beacon的UUID，Name，MacAddress，Major，Minor，MeasuredPower，Rssi，battery，temperature，version，属性。
